meanings.sent1: The toy had a plasticky feel to it.
meanings.sent2: The new phone case looked plasticky.
meanings.sent3: The plasticky cupcake decorations were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as plasticky as a fake plant.
meanings.sent5: The plasticky smell of the factory lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: The chair was so plasticky, it squeaked when you sat on it.
meanings.sent2: The plasticky fork was perfect for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: He wore a plasticky crown to the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The plasticky raincoat protected her from the storm.
meanings.sent5: The plasticky texture of the tablecloth was easy to clean.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of plastic.
meanings.sent1: The plasticky material was easy to mold into shapes.
meanings.sent3: The plasticky sound of the keyboard clicking was satisfying.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded plasticky over the phone.
meanings.sent5: The plasticky taste of the cake frosting was too sweet for her liking.
